rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG} owned by {50000567}
For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true

description: This unit will examine important remedial issues in commercial disputes and how they can be effectively resolved. It bridges the divide between remedies law, civil procedure and dispute resolution. Issues addressed include pre-emptive remedies, enforcement of bargains, damages for economic loss under common law and statute, the resolution of disputes in commercial partnerships and modern strategies for dispute resolution.
